title: Wahoo Systm training app expands on The Sufferfest, shares The Knowledge podcast
content:
Wahoo turns their software skills to a new Systm indoor training app to help endurance cyclists build power and form from home throughout the year. Developed over the backbone of the long-proven Sufferfest, Systm includes a diverse workout library across even more active disciplines to keep motivated athletes of all levels interested in their training

The post Wahoo Systm training app expands on The Sufferfest, shares The Knowledge podcast appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
